channel.title: Moparscape Server Restarter Help!
channel.description: Whenever i try to use ANY restarter tht comes with the sources includin the vista one. whenever iits time to restart the server it says "tskill is not recognized as an internal or external command" or ""TASKKILL" is not recognized as an internal or external command" plz help i tried coding voule.bat aftr and did taskkill /f /pid # but didnt work (taskkill error thing again -.-) i got windows vista and java is located in program files (x86) idk if its got anythin to do wit......ALSO!!!! my command prompt doesnt work so i gotta use the system 32 one and get to it from run!!!! but idt tht matters cuz one workd but i couldnt edit to see wat commands were plxz help PL0x!!!!!plzzzzzz :confused: :o :P :cool: :eek: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: Moparscape Server Restarter Help!
item.dc:creator: @masseve1 masseve1
item.description:
@masseve1 wrote:

Whenever i try to use ANY restarter tht comes with the sources includin the vista one. whenever iits time to restart the server it says “tskill is not recognized as an internal or external command” or ““TASKKILL” is not recognized as an internal or external command” plz help i tried coding voule.bat aftr and did taskkill /f /pid # but didnt work (taskkill error thing again -.-) i got windows vista and java is located in program files (x86) idk if its got anythin to do wit…ALSO!!! my command prompt doesnt work so i gotta use the system 32 one and get to it from run!!! but idt tht matters cuz one workd but i couldnt edit to see wat commands were plxz help PL0x!!!plzzzzzz :o :eek: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
